title: How do Netflix originals work? - Quora

response.answer_text: They are shows and movies which are distrobuted by Netflix first in a given region. Some are produced by Netflix and others are licensed. Some were Netflix Original from season 1 some have Netflix Original seasons if they picked it up after someone else cancelled it. Some are only Netflix Originals in certain countries and regions. Some are Originals world wide. Recut, restored, colorized, dubbed, or significantly changed to the point where one could argue it's a derivative work could also be considered an Original though that hasn't really come up yet.
